projects.description: Freelance mission for <link0>Imparato</link0> to set up a translation system on the Imparato mobile application.
projects.title: Imparato (freelance mission)

projects.description:
Learning and creating ML algorithms in Python only with standard libraries as well as pandas and numpy.

The algorithms I have reproduced are: Naives Bayes Classifier, Decision Tree Classifier and a Neural Network. These algorithms were made as a learning project during my 4th year at Epitech.
projects.title: Machine learning (learning)

projects.description:
Internship of 5 months on a block release training then 3 months full-time at <link0>Imparato</link0>, an application aimed at helping actors rehearse their texts.

In addition to bug fixing and improving the UI/UX, I participated in the creation of new functionalities on the web and mobile app such as <link1>the addition of notes and bookmarks</link1> on the texts or even <link2>the implementation of sound effects</link2> on the application.

The technologies used were React Js and React Native.
projects.title: Imparato (internship)

projects.description:
Project made with 6 students to reproduce the operation of a site like Zapier: allow a user to connect different services in order to automate actions between them (for example, when the user creates a new PR on Github, this creates a new task of the name of the PR on his Trello).

I worked on the web interface as well as on the server (authentication and webhooks).

The technologies I used were React Js and NodeJs.
projects.title: Area (learning)

projects.description:
I developed with 2 other students a game platform which can change graphic style during the game. The available games are "Pacman" and "Snake". The graphic libraries used are SFML, SDL and Ncurses.

This project was carried out in Cpp during the 2nd year at Epitech.
projects.title: Arcade (learning)

projects.description:
Full-time internship at <link0>Sportbak</link0>, an application allowing futsal players to collect and view their individual and collective stats of their match.

During my internship at Sportbak, I worked on the creation of leagues and football tournaments on the application as well as the visualization of player statistics during these leagues and tournaments.

The technologies used were Ionic and Angular5.
projects.title: Sportbak (internship)

projects.description:
Full-time internship at <link0>Hexacoffre</link0>, a safe company.

During this internship, I created a showcase site for Hexacoffre specially designed to present its services to the Paris region.
 
The technology used was Wordpress.
projects.title: Hexacoffre (internship)
